title: @Riot KateyKhaos Order of the lotus Karma textures
body: So with the upcoming Irelia skin, with the same theme, will OotL Karma receive some polishing? The skin always seemed like it never got the full texture pass. It's blurry and gold pieces look off (not talking about translucent clothes). Even the new Irelia skin who has an older model than Karma looks more polished. I wish they were brought more in line.

replies.body:
Hey Gapybo,

At this time, we don't have plans to update Order of the Lotus Karma.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9i2Ta34O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-01T17:28:43.789+0000)
>
> Hey Gapybo,
> 
> At this time, we don't have plans to update Order of the Lotus Karma.

Make them please. You guys say no too much IMHO (99% of the time, it feels).
This skin is less than a year old, and IMO, there are other skins who are in much more need of a visual update.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9i2Ta34O,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-01T20:34:27.995+0000)
>
> This skin is less than a year old, and IMO, there are other skins who are in much more need of a visual update.

This would mean something if skins were being updated.

Also, no excuse for poor worksmanship. He's right about the poor texturing.

Not only that, I'm mostly referring to all the no's with regards to skins on PBE.

Look at your post history... you guys reject so freaking much, it just feels like your team doesn't give a flying hoot about player wants.

And about these other skins that are 'more' in need of a visual update... are any actually being visually updated?

Magnificent Twisted Fate for instance, a nearly $20 skin under the Legendary Tier.

Yes, I've heard it before... we have no plans, he is as he was when shipped under that price point & we have no plans to update his pricing or bring the skin in-line with others of its kind.

So just tell us, what skins are being visually updated then? Any? When? Soon(tm) is getting really old when we have virtually nothing to show for all the soon(tm)'s years later.

What of the promised Quinn MTU/TU that was supposed to be expedited over two years ago now due to her being rushed in the Art Dept.?

Where is that? I'm salty over this subject because I spent those two years rigorously seeking follow through on this to turn up nothing.

Still waiting on IronStylus to respond.

Skins that are being updated a mainly going to be those in line with Champion Visual Updates and texture Updates,  for example, all of the Tristana skins got polished up when the changed her model.  When champs get full VU's or even just model tweaks, it completely changes how clothes sit on the model and where/how abilities/aa's are casted.  If you look at the [Update Schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule), that should give you an idea of which skins are up for reworking.

> [{quoted}](name=The Sionce Guy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9i2Ta34O,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-02T00:45:38.964+0000)
>
> Skins that are being updated a mainly going to be those in line with Champion Visual Updates and texture Updates,  for example, all of the Tristana skins got polished up when the changed her model.  When champs get full VU's or even just model tweaks, it completely changes how clothes sit on the model and where/how abilities/aa's are casted.  If you look at the [Update Schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule), that should give you an idea of which skins are up for reworking.

Skins being updated as part of a ChampUp process don't count, really.

Characters like Karma won't see a VU from ChampUp, so her botched textures will remain permanently unless Riot changes their stance.
